Yet the fabric is still lightweight enough that it won't block out all of the light from the great outdoors.Ideal for an upstairs bedroom where a good night sleep is a must, the rimini black can serve as a bold new take on a coloured feature wall, or alternatively can be coupled and offset with a range of off-whites and greys to provide a very sleek and modern feel to a bedroom.

products.productdescription:

This black roller blind is perfect for blocking out the heat and harmful uv rays from your room, keeping the core room temperature down, a must for any modern environment. These magic screen blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let anybody outside see in. Perfect for maintaining privacy if you live near a busy road/ street or have have a room that is over-looked by other properties. 
 
At swift direct blinds, with over 50 years experience, we take quality seriously. Their bespoke roller blinds are crafted by their team of experts, and not only comes with customer-first service and industry-leading quick delivery times, but also comes with a free five year guarantee! The easy-to-use roller-blind is durable, lightweight, and high quality; everything one looks for in a home blind.The delicate patterning of the affinity black looks can add interest to monochrome dcor schemes, where blacks, greys, and whites win the day. Pair with shimmering silvers for a glamourous bedroom look, or with bold reds for a contemporary dining room style.

products.title: Gibson Jet Black Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The rich gibson jet black is a deep, pure black colour. Use this in lighter rooms or pair in with other black furniture. Don't be scared of the dark. The thicker pvc fabric makes this a 100% waterproof blind - perfect for the bathroom.
products.productdescription: The rich gibson jet black is a deep, pure black colour. Use this in lighter rooms or pair in with other black furniture. Don't be scared of the dark. The thicker pvc fabric makes this a 100% waterproof blind - perfect for the bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Herringbone, Black - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Herringbone, black - roller blind sometimes all a great interior needs is simplicity. When you want to be able to bring your space to life, the minimalist stylings of herringbone enable you to do exactly that, whilst simultaneously adding a modern twist.
products.productdescription: Sometimes all a great interior needs is simplicity. When you want to be able to bring your space to life, the minimalist stylings of herringbone enable you to do exactly that, whilst simultaneously adding a modern twist. The gentle off-white background works in perfect harmony with the definitive black lines to create a look to cherish. If you want to add some geometric patterning to your interior, the secret is not to overdo things. Creating a matching feature wall that sits opposite your windows is the way to go. That way you can break up your space, rather than overcrowding it.

products.title: Bella Blackout Black Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout black electric roller blind. Made to measure from 138.17 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, their bella blackout black electric roller blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout electric roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Due to their chain-free control options their electric roller blinds are inherently child-safe by design, and if you upgrade with the smart home hub, their electric roller blinds become controllable with your mobile phone. 
 
At swift direct blind, quality comes first. Their roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by their roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do their blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.
